[NONE][CKV_AWS_33] Ensure KMS key policy does not contain wildcard (*) principal

failure.message: Ensure KMS key policy does not contain wildcard (*) principal

testcase.failure:
Resource: aws_kms_key.dynamodb_key File: /main.tf: 76-96 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-iam-policies/ensure-kms-key-policy-does-not-contain-wildcard-principal
76 | resource "aws_kms_key" "dynamodb_key" { 77 | description = "CMK for DynamoDB encryption" 78 | deletion_window_in_days = 10 79 | enable_key_rotation = true 80 | 81 | policy = jsonencode({ 82 | Version = "2012-10-17" 83 | Id = "default" 84 | Statement = [ 85 | { 86 | Sid = "Enable IAM User Permissions" 87 | Effect = "Allow" 88 | Principal = { 89 | AWS = "*" 90 | } 91 | Action = "kms:*" 92 | Resource = "*" 93 | } 94 | ] 95 | }) 96 | }

testcase.name: [NONE][CKV_AWS_33] Ensure KMS key policy does not contain wildcard (*) principal

failure.message: Ensure KMS key policy does not contain wildcard (*) principal

testcase.failure:
Resource: aws_kms_key.lambda_env_key File: /main.tf: 131-151 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-iam-policies/ensure-kms-key-policy-does-not-contain-wildcard-principal
131 | resource "aws_kms_key" "lambda_env_key" { 132 | description = "KMS key for encrypting Lambda environment variables" 133 | deletion_window_in_days = 10 134 | enable_key_rotation = true 135 | 136 | policy = jsonencode({ 137 | Version = "2012-10-17" 138 | Id = "default" 139 | Statement = [ 140 | { 141 | Sid = "Enable IAM User Permissions" 142 | Effect = "Allow" 143 | Principal = { 144 | AWS = "*" 145 | } 146 | Action = "kms:*" 147 | Resource = "*" 148 | } 149 | ] 150 | }) 151 | }

263 | resource "aws_apigatewayv2_stage" "default_stage" { 264 | api_id = aws_apigatewayv2_api.http_api.id 265 | name = "$default" 266 | auto_deploy = true 267 | }
